column1: in memory of ed riley -- w. e. pegues funeral directors| facts death: june 19
column9: 2015. he was born in jackson on december 29
column11: to james edwin ""jimmy"" and barbara jean robbins riley. ed was a 1990 graduate of tupelo high school. he was the owner of rileys residential services in jackson. ed enjoyed fishing and golfing. a celebration of life service will be 11 a. m. monday
column14: at the jefferson street chapel of w. e. pegues with rev. james marks officiating. burial will be in tupelo memorial park. w. e. pegues funeral directors is in charge of the arrangements. survivors include two daughters
column16: georgia and megan riley of mooreville; one son
column17: walker riley cooke and his mother
column18: meredith cooke of jackson; one sister
column19: kathlyn ""kit"" lamons of mooreville; two uncles
column20: jimmy robbins of pontotoc and bill riley of washington
column22: alexandra mc. larty and anna catelyn mc. larty; one nephew
column23: eddie lamons. he was preceded in death by his mother
column26: james and emogene robbins and james f. ""jim"" and marion riley. visitation will be 4 until 6 p. m. sunday
column29: tupelo and 9:30 a. m. until service time monday. expressions of sympathy may be left at www. peguesfuneralhome. com
